item.title: iPhone Lifts Smartphone Market Shipments as Rivals Stall
item.description: Apple’s iPhone shipments are expected to grow nearly 4% in 2025, lifting the entire smartphone industry as rivals face slower demand and regional setbacks, according to new data from IDC. IDC has rais

item.title: Report: AirPods Pro 3 Needed to Turn Around Sales Flatline
item.description: The AirPods market appears to be flatlining in the United States, but the launch of AirPods Pro 3 later this year could boost sales, a new report claims. According to a new report from Consumer Intell
